message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.HC, cs.AI, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely category as the paper discusses the development of technology for generating textual or spoken descriptions of exhibits in multiple languages.
- cs.IR (Information Retrieval) is also likely as the system uses a language-independent database to retrieve information for generating descriptions.
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is relevant as the system is designed to tailor descriptions based on user backgrounds and previous interactions with the system.
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is relevant as the system uses natural language processing and machine learning techniques to generate personalized descriptions.
- cs.MM (Multimedia) is relevant as the system is designed to work in virtual reality environments and generate spoken descriptions.
